definition: breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: Do not clutter up the page with so many illustrations that you obscure the message.
sentences.chinese: 不要在一頁內放置過多的插圖，那樣會模糊訊息。

sentences.english: The sending application specifies response queues when the application sends its messages.
sentences.chinese: 傳回至迴應佇列的訊息是應用程式指定的。

sentences.english: MissionThe mission of the EV Ministry is to spread the good news of Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 福傳委員會的使命是要傳揚主耶穌基督救恩的好訊息。

sentences.english: A message from %1 was dropped, because it contained a blacklisted word.
sentences.chinese: 送來的訊息已被丟棄，因爲包含被擋掉的字眼。

sentences.english: This message is often overlooked while people bash other sins that are not as common.
sentences.chinese: 儘管人們往往忽視這個訊息打壞，不像其他罪常見。

sentences.english: But its action conveys a powerful message.
sentences.chinese: 是次行動帶出強而有力的訊息。

sentences.english: Sometimes you just need to improve the wording of an error message.
sentences.chinese: 有時候只要改良某個錯誤訊息的用字。

sentences.english: In the end, however, they recovered only 43 messages.
sentences.chinese: 不過，最後他們也只是找回了43條訊息。

sentences.english: Okay, I am very glad to be here and I am ready to transcribe this message.
sentences.chinese: 對，我很高興我在這兒，我已準備好轉錄訊息。

sentences.english: It was their farewell message as they signed off. Stay Hungry. Stay Foolish. And I've always wished that for myself.
sentences.chinese: 那是他們親筆寫下的告別訊息，我總是以此自許。

sentences.english: In communications, a series of codes to denote the end of a message.
sentences.chinese: 你也能選擇在訊息的末端添加一個簽名檔。

sentences.english: What if an ad coes in at exactly the same time as a chat ?
sentences.chinese: 那如果廣告作爲一個新的聊天訊息出場的話呢？

sentences.english: Instead, such devices usually show only a device-specific error message, or the error code.
sentences.chinese: 此類裝置通常只顯示裝置的特定錯誤訊息或錯誤碼。

sentences.english: How to get the information of China Queer Film Festival Tour?
sentences.chinese: 如何獲得中國酷兒影像巡迴展的展映訊息？

sentences.english: A middle click always opens this message.
sentences.chinese: 滑鼠中鍵用於開啓此訊息。

sentences.english: So we still get our message out through the Web.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們還是通過網絡傳播我們的訊息。

definition: to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
to pass on/to convey/to relay/to transmit/transmission
to transmit/to pass on to sb else/(math.) transitive
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
connection/contact/relation/to get in touch with/to integrate/to link/to touch
